sense.gloss: for a moment, for a minute
for a while, for some time
for the time being, for now
it's been a long time, long time no see
for a short while, for a brief period, soon, in a short while
after a short time, in a short while, a short time later
interim government, provisional government, caretaker government

sdata.j: われわれはその↑会合↑↓かいごう↓を↑暫定↑↓ざんてい↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑月曜日↑↓げつようび↓ときめています。それは↑変更↑↓へんこう↓することがあります。
sdata.e: We've set the meeting tentatively for Monday. It's subject to change.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑暫↑↓しばら↓く↑待↑↓ま↓つように↑言↑↓い↓われた。
sdata.e: I was told to wait for a while.

sdata.j: ↑社↑↓しゃ↓の↑弁護士↑↓べんごし↓に↑暫定↑↓ざんてい↓↑合意↑↓ごうい↓の↑内容↑↓ないよう↓を↑吟味↑↓ぎんみ↓してもらおう。
sdata.e: We'll have our firm's attorneys look through the provisional agreement.

sdata.j: 「↑直↑↓なお↓る↑見込↑↓みこ↓みは？」「システム↑開発↑↓かいはつ↓チームのシュバイシェン↑博士↑↓はかせ↓が↑現在↑↓げんざい↓↑闘病↑↓とうびょう↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓のため、もう↑暫↑↓しばら↓くはかかるかと・・・」
sdata.e: Prospects for repair? "Prof. Shubaishen, the leader of the system development team, is presently unwell so we think it will take a while longer ..."

sdata.j: ちなみにここ↑一↑↓いち↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓は、↑例↑↓たと↓えばフラグが↑立↑↓た↓っていようとも、↑Ｈ↑↓えいち↓シーンが↑無↑↓な↓い↑事↑↓こと↓は↑確定↑↓かくてい↓↑事項↑↓じこう↓だからな。↑暫↑↓しばら↓くの↑間↑↓ま↓、↑辛抱↑↓しんぼう↓な！
sdata.e: By the way, this week - no matter what flags are set - it's a certainty that there will be no ecchi scenes. You'll just have to bear with it a while.

words.gloss: for a moment, for a minute
